bibl.title: Raising Statues and Blocks from the Sea at Alexandria.
bibl.note: Continuation of: IDEM, Alexandria: The Underwater Site near Qaitbay Fort, Egyptian Archaeology 8 (1996) pp. 7-10, 8 figg. n./bl. et coul. - In the autumn of 1995, thirty-four massive blocks, including a colossal statue and a sphinx, were raised and brought to dry land.
EMPEREUR Jean-Yves, Raising Statues and Blocks from the Sea at Alexandria.
